html:
5.16.20  11:42 am   how has the current pandemic affected you and your Project

      put it this way, i no longer go out to lunch

5.16.20  10:49 am   on the outside it seems to me like you have a lot figured out in terms of lifestyle. Hard working and determined almost like a monk. Were you ever not like this?

     sort of, but maybe

      like not hard working? Was there a specific change that prompted this? 

      what must have happened, is i must have found myself in the middle of a huge field, and then realized i need to dedicate my life to somehow explaining how the field feels

5.16.20  10:47 am   How does making music taste?

      like multiple generations of salvation, all wrapped into one moment

5.16.20  10:16 am   Why are you so talented 

      could be some kind of childhood defense mechanism

5.16.20  8:52 am   Why did you add "And i'm eating porridge but i've heated it for the wrong amount of time"?

      because it was better than what i had there before. actually, now that i go back and check, it seems like the porridge line is a good metaphor for what was going wrong with the previous solution i had there

5.16.20  8:16 am   How do you come up with lyrics for a song?

     musically

      I want to make a song myself, but I cant think of any

      don't think of just words, think of words being sung. then the whole thing will be tied together from the start

5.16.20  8:04 am   Opinion on breadcrumbs?

      a good alternative to google maps

5.16.20  7:47 am   How do you pronounce worcestershire sauce?

      impossible. it can't be done

5.16.20  7:40 am   are you hibernating?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

5.16.20  7:39 am   what colour are mirrors?

      donkey colored

5.16.20  7:36 am   Do you ever feel really lost?

      oh hell yeah

5.16.20  6:53 am   What color rocks do you like the most?

      donkey colored rocks

5.16.20  6:35 am   Do you think donkeys are real

      yes, but this is obfuscated by the overwhelming amount of fictional donkeys out there

5.16.20  5:44 am   How can I make sure my cat won't eat me?

      surround yourself with a protective wall of cacti (cactuses)

5.16.20  5:35 am   what do you think about ions?

      bite sized yet surprisingly filling

5.16.20  4:49 am   what is your favorite font

      grain of salt

5.16.20  4:36 am   are there any truthful birds?

      yes, all of them except 1.

5.16.20  4:20 am   What shape is a rainbow, is it a cut-out of a plane? a torus? a infinite slice through the horizontal centre of a torus, but then where is the centre of a torus?

      it's a plane that turns to face you

5.16.20  4:15 am   will we ever open all the boxes?

      someone's gotta do it

5.16.20  4:15 am   do capital letters exist?

      yes, i have touched them

5.16.20  3:56 am   What is your favorite genre of music?

      normal

5.16.20  3:49 am   What do you thing about egypt ? 

      it's like a Sign, that says both "Welcome to Africa", and "Welcome Out of Africa"

5.16.20  2:38 am   do you listen to your own music?

      almost

5.16.20  2:29 am   what is tecnology

      simulations

5.16.20  2:15 am   dO yOU tHINK iT'S bAD wHEN cAPITAL lETTERS aRE rEVERSED. 

      no, i think it's lovely. i find it can happen more often on Windows

5.16.20  1:57 am   Are you doing okay?

     yes

     Can you recommend a recipe?

      2 pieces of hydrogen and 1 piece of oxygen

5.16.20  1:49 am   Have you ever heard steel drums/

     yes

     would you ever use one/multiple in a song

      absolutely. already have if you count simulations. which most of the world is nowadays

5.16.20  1:46 am   don't you think, bill, that it is at least plausible that some of the "flat earthers" actually do believe the earth is flat?

      not really, but think of it this way: there is big money to be made if you can find someone who does. think of it, it makes a Top News Story- "PERSON THINKS THE WORLD IS FLAT" ..... *click**click**click**click**click**click**click**click**click**click**click**click**click**click**click**click**click**click**click* (all the people clicking on it, getting their mind blown at the idea that someone might actually think that). So you see,

5.16.20  1:33 am   What are your thoughts on Quantum mechanics?

      'oh that would explain a lot'

5.16.20  1:23 am   have you ever considered teaching music?

      i prefer to mentor on a question by question, person to person basis

5.16.20  1:20 am   What are some places that exist?

      the ocean,

5.16.20  1:19 am   Are you optimistic?

      i can be

5.16.20  12:41 am   Bill, how do you deal with the unending stupidity of the human race?

      one thing that usually helps, is its unending intelligence

5.16.20  12:34 am   Would you lick every metro seat across the country until the germs combined have you superpowers and you became an atomic warlord?

      no

5.16.20  12:32 am   What's your opinion on nothingness?

      overwhelming

5.16.20  12:00 am   how do i avoid inaccuracies in my novel?

      impossible. that's because there are inaccuracies in the real world as well

5.15.20  11:57 pm   Are you working on any big projects?, and if so what are they?

      i'm re-inventing the graphics department. i did not plan this

5.15.20  11:45 pm   What's the best fruit

      juice

5.15.20  11:30 pm   is the world made out of dots or triangles?

      it looks like dots but if you look much closer it's triangles. until you look even closer and you can see that the triangle is made up of dots

5.15.20  11:17 pm   How to forget the bad memories Ive made

      make more good ones

5.15.20  10:55 pm   what is the best joke you've ever heard?

      i have never heard a joke

5.15.20  10:42 pm   favorite type of rat? 

      brat

5.15.20  10:39 pm   back when you went out to lunch, would you try to go to different places so you wouldn't be recognized as bill wurtz? or did you just get lucky and the regulars at the place you went to didn't usually recognize you?

      always go to the same place. if i ever don't know where i am going, it's gonna take me literally hours to figure it out, sending me into an existential tailspin as i struggle to grasp my own identity

5.15.20  10:30 pm   what are your thoughts on cups

      objectively, they are medium sized

5.15.20  10:22 pm   Will you use capital letters in new video?

      i use capital letters in every video. for the sake of tradition

5.15.20  10:15 pm   what are some good ways to get started with j a z z type composition? i want spicier chords but ones that work together

      it seems to me that you are using the word 'j a z z' as a codeword for something only you know exactly what is. think back to the last time you heard a piece of music that you considered 'j a z z'. use that as a starting point

5.15.20  10:03 pm   Should I be excited for the near future?

      yes

5.15.20  9:43 pm   If we are 70% water are we cannibals

      no

5.15.20  9:37 pm   what does it all mean?

      everything

5.15.20  9:00 pm   Opinion on semicolons?

      it is a clever ploy, to trick people who think they cannot handle the full colon into actually getting more
